Body:
"""Check parameters.normalize_parameter_df."""
parameter_df = pd.DataFrame({PARAMETER_ID: ['par0', 'par1', 'par2'],
    PARAMETER_SCALE: [LOG10, LOG10, LIN], NOMINAL_VALUE: [0.01, 0.001, 
    0.0001], ESTIMATE: [1, 1, 0], LOWER_BOUND: [1e-05, 1e-06, 1e-07],
    UPPER_BOUND: [100000.0, 1000000.0, 10000000.0]}).set_index(PARAMETER_ID)
lint.check_parameter_df(df=parameter_df)
parameter_df.loc['par2', NOMINAL_VALUE] = ''
with pytest.raises(AssertionError):
    lint.check_parameter_df(df=parameter_df)
del parameter_df[NOMINAL_VALUE]
with pytest.raises(AssertionError):
    lint.check_parameter_df(df=parameter_df)
